property.name: offer_key
property.value: Accept this Quest to begin the Prepper Stockpile Challenge Part 1. Begin by getting some cooking basics in place.

property.name: subtitle_key
property.value: Prepper Stockpile Part 1

property.name: description_key
property.value: Collect some stone, craft a Campfire, and place it for use.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: Accept this Quest to begin the Prepper Stockpile Challenge Part 1. Begin by getting some cooking basics in place.

property.name: name_key
property.value: Cooking Pot Party

property.name: subtitle_key
property.value: Prepper Stockpile Part 1

property.name: description_key
property.value: Acquire a Cooking Pot for your Campfire, and ingredients to make Bacon and Eggs with Biscuits.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: Accept this Quest to begin the Prepper Stockpile Challenge Part 1. Begin by getting some cooking basics in place.

property.name: name_key
property.value: Acorn Flour

property.name: subtitle_key
property.value: Prepper Stockpile Part 1

property.name: description_key
property.value: Make 5 Acorn Flour in preparation for Acorn Biscuits.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: Accept this Quest to begin the Prepper Stockpile Challenge Part 1. Begin by getting some cooking basics in place.

property.name: name_key
property.value: Acorn Biscuits

property.name: subtitle_key
property.value: Prepper Stockpile Part 1

property.name: description_key
property.value: Make 5 Acorn Biscuits in preparation for Bacon and Eggs with Biscuits.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: Accept this Quest to begin the Prepper Stockpile Challenge Part 1. Begin by getting some cooking basics in place.

property.name: name_key
property.value: Bacon and Eggs with Biscuits

property.name: subtitle_key
property.value: Prepper Stockpile Part 1

property.name: description_key
property.value: Place a skill in Master Chef or find a schematic to unlock and cook Bacon and Eggs with Biscuits. You may also loot or purchase them. Place 5 Bacon and Eggs with Biscuits into your inventory. This preparation task gives you some surplus while you loot, shoot, and continue your preparation tasks. Receive XP, 1 Skill Point and a Cooking Grill for your efforts. Continue to Part 2.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: Accept this Quest to begin the Prepper Stockpile Challenge Part 2. Collect a Wrench, some Pipe weapons, and Ammo resources.

property.name: subtitle_key
property.value: Prepper Stockpile Part 2

property.name: description_key
property.value: Place a skill in Salvage Operations or find a schematic to unlock and craft a Wrench. You may also loot or purchase one. Place a Wrench into your inventory.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: Accept this Quest to begin the Prepper Stockpile Challenge Part 2. Collect a Wrench, some Pipe weapons, and Ammo resources.

property.name: name_key
property.value: Pipe Weapons

property.name: subtitle_key
property.value: Prepper Stockpile Part 2

property.name: description_key
property.value: Craft, loot, or purchase a Pipe Pistol, Pipe Machine Gun, Pipe Rifle, and Pipe Shotgun and place into your inventory. The Wrench will assist in collecting recipe resources.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: Accept this Quest to begin the Prepper Stockpile Challenge Part 2. Collect a Wrench, some Pipe weapons, and Ammo resources.

property.name: subtitle_key
property.value: Prepper Stockpile Part 2

property.name: description_key
property.value: Collect some Coal and Potassium Nitrate Powder to make 50 Gunpowder on your person.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: Accept this Quest to begin the Prepper Stockpile Challenge Part 2. Collect a Wrench, some Pipe weapons, and Ammo resources.

property.name: name_key
property.value: Iron Arrows

property.name: subtitle_key
property.value: Prepper Stockpile Part 2

property.name: description_key
property.value: Place a skill in Advanced Engineering to unlock a Forge to craft 50 Iron Arrowheads. You may also loot or purchase them. Use 50 Iron Arrowheads, Wood, and Feathers to make 50 Iron Arrows on your person.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: Accept this Quest to begin the Prepper Stockpile Challenge Part 2. Collect a Wrench, some Pipe weapons, and Ammo resources.

property.name: name_key
property.value: Stone Spear

property.name: subtitle_key
property.value: Prepper Stockpile Part 2

property.name: description_key
property.value: Craft a Stone Spear. It helps to keep hostiles at a distance, especially when health is low. Receive XP, 1 Skill Point, and a Weapon Maintenance Mod as a reward. Continue to Part 3.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: Accept this Quest to begin the Prepper Stockpile Challenge Part 3. Craft and place a Workbench, followed by Farm Plots, a Coop and Hive, and then Traps.

property.name: subtitle_key
property.value: Prepper Stockpile Part 3

property.name: description_key
property.value: Place 2 skill in Advanced Engineering, or find a schematic to unlock a Workbench. Craft and place it.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: Accept this Quest to begin the Prepper Stockpile Challenge Part 3. Craft and place a Workbench, followed by Farm Plots, a Coop and Hive, and then Traps.

property.name: name_key
property.value: Quality of Life

property.name: subtitle_key
property.value: Prepper Stockpile Part 3

property.name: description_key
property.value: Unlock, craft and place a Chicken Coop, Bee Hive, 4 Farm Plots, Wood Burning Prepper Stove, and Fish Trap. Ensure you place the correct types.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: Accept this Quest to begin the Prepper Stockpile Challenge Part 3. Craft and place a Workbench, followed by Farm Plots, a Coop and Hive, and then Traps.

property.name: name_key
property.value: Chicks, Queens, and Bait

property.name: subtitle_key
property.value: Prepper Stockpile Part 3

property.name: description_key
property.value: Find 2 Caught Chicks from Birds' Nests, and 1 Queen Bee from a Tree. Craft Bait for the Fish Trap. Add them to the Coop, Hive, and Fish Trap when ready.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: Accept this Quest to begin the Prepper Stockpile Challenge Part 3. Craft and place a Workbench, followed by Farm Plots, a Coop and Hive, and then Traps.

property.name: subtitle_key
property.value: Prepper Stockpile Part 3

property.name: description_key
property.value: Craft and place 2 Tar Traps and 1 Cactus Trap on the Workbench.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: Accept this Quest to begin the Prepper Stockpile Challenge Part 3. Craft and place a Workbench, followed by Farm Plots, a Coop and Hive, and then Traps.

property.name: name_key
property.value: Chicken, Honey Comb, and Catfish

property.name: subtitle_key
property.value: Prepper Stockpile Part 3

property.name: description_key
property.value: Farm 3 Grown Domestic Chickens, 15 Honey Comb, and 1 Catfish. Receive XP, 1 Skill Point, and 4 Rock Drill Gas Cans as a reward. This completes Prepper Stockpile Quest for now...

property.name: offer_key
property.value: Accept this quest to eliminate 500 Zombies through multiple smaller stages. Eliminate 10 in the first stage for 500 Dukes, 15 for 1500 XP, 25 for 1250 Dukes, 50 for 5000 XP, 75 for 3750 Dukes, 125 for 12500 XP, and 200 for 1 Skill. This Quest repeats in an endless loop.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: Accept this quest to hunt a variety of animals through multiple smaller stages. You will receive Dukes and XP for completing each stage, and 2 Skill for the final stage. This Quest repeats in an endless loop.

property.name: name_key
property.value: Chickens and Rabbits

property.name: subtitle_key
property.value: Chickens and Rabbits

property.name: description_key
property.value: Hunt 4 Chickens and 4 Rabbits to receive a reward and move to the next animal stage.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: Accept this quest to hunt a variety of animals through multiple smaller stages. You will receive Dukes and XP for completing each stage, and 2 Skill for the final stage. This Quest repeats in an endless loop.

property.name: subtitle_key
property.value: Does, Boars, Wolves, and Coyotes

property.name: description_key
property.value: Hunt 3 Does, 3 Boars, 3 Wolves, and 3 Coyotes to receive a reward and move to the next animal stage.

property.name: offer_key

property.name: name_key
property.value: Z Bear, BM Z Bunny, BM Z Chicken, Dire Wolf, and Z Grace

property.name: subtitle_key
property.value: Z Bear, BM Z Bunny, BM Z Chicken, Dire Wolf, and Z Grace

property.name: description_key
property.value: Hunt a Zombie Bear, Blood Moon Zombie Bunny, Blood Moon Zombie Chicken, Dire Wolf, and Zombie Grace Boar to receive a reward and restart the animal stages.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: Accept this quest to eliminate 50 Utility Workers with only the Nailgun. You can use the regular or more powerful steel nails to complete the task. XP, Dukes, and 1 Skill for your troubles.
